alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga; Southern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 10:11PM EST until January 08 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Additional snowfall after 10 PM of up to 2 inches, producing totals of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Onondaga, Madison and Southern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the early morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the falling snow, northwest winds with gusts of 15 to 25 mph could cause localized blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
